org.apache.taverna.platform.execution.api

Class AbstractExecutionService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.taverna.platform.execution.api.AbstractExecutionService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExecutionService
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LocalExecutionService, RemoteExecutionService

    public abstract class AbstractExecutionService
extends Object
implements ExecutionService
    A common super type for concrete implementations of ExecutionServices.
    Author:
    David Withers

      • createExecution

        public String createExecution(ExecutionEnvironment executionEnvironment,
                              org.apache.taverna.scufl2.api.container.WorkflowBundle workflowBundle,
                              org.apache.taverna.scufl2.api.core.Workflow workflow,
                              org.apache.taverna.scufl2.api.profiles.Profile profile,
                              org.apache.taverna.robundle.Bundle dataBundle)
                       throws InvalidWorkflowException
        Description copied from interface: ExecutionService
        Creates a workflow execution and returns its ID.
        Specified by:
        createExecution in interface ExecutionService
        Parameters:
        executionEnvironment - the ExecutionEnvironment used to execute the Workflow
        workflowBundle - the WorkflowBundle containing the workflows required for execution
        workflow - the workflow to execute
        profile - the profile to use when executing the workflow
        dataBundle - the Bundle containing the data values for the Workflow
        Returns:
        the ID of the created workflow execution
        Throws:
        InvalidWorkflowException

      • createExecutionImpl

        protected abstract Execution createExecutionImpl(org.apache.taverna.scufl2.api.container.WorkflowBundle workflowBundle,
                                                 org.apache.taverna.scufl2.api.core.Workflow workflow,
                                                 org.apache.taverna.scufl2.api.profiles.Profile profile,
                                                 org.apache.taverna.robundle.Bundle dataBundle)
                                          throws InvalidWorkflowException
        Creates an implementation of an Execution. To be implemented by concrete implementations of ExecutionService.
        Parameters:
        workflowBundle - the WorkflowBundle containing the Workflows required for execution
        workflow - the Workflow to execute
        profile - the Profile to use when executing the Workflow
        dataBundle - the Bundle containing the data values for the Workflow
        Returns:
        a new Execution implementation
        Throws:
        InvalidWorkflowException - if the specified workflow is invalid
